actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption where a taxpayer, his spouse, or any dependent of the taxpayer is handicapped.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an additional income tax exemption for each taxpayer, spouse, or dependent who is suffering from a mental or physical disability which constitutes a substantial handicap to employment or education.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption where a taxpayer, his spouse, or any dependent of the taxpayer is handicapped.
